sen.j: 第1条は、天皇・王族や豪族たちによる土地・人民の所有を廃止するものである。
sen.e: Section 1 was to abolish ownership of lands and citizens by the Emperor, royal families and gozoku (local ruling families).
Article 1 was to abolish ownership of lands and people by the Emperor, royal families and gozoku (local ruling families).

sen.j: それまで、国内の土地・人民は天皇・王族・豪族が各自で私的に所有・支配しており、天皇・王族の所有地は屯倉、支配民は名代・子代と呼ばれ、豪族の所有地は田荘、支配民は部曲と呼ばれていた。
sen.e: Before that, land and people had been privately owned and ruled by the emperor, royal families and local ruling families, and the lands and citizens thus privately owned by the emperor or royal families had been called Miyake and the people ruled by them had been called Nashiro or Koshiro while the lands owned by local ruling families had been called Tadokoro and the citizens ruled by them had been called Kakibe.

Before that, land and people had been privately owned and ruled by the emperor, royal families and gozoku families, and the lands privately owned by the emperor or royal families were called Miyake and the people ruled by them were called Nashiro or Koshiro while the lands owned by gozoku families were called Tadokoro and the people ruled by them had were called Kakibe.
sen.cmt: citizens→ people, had been→were, the lands and citizens thus→the landsに修正、豪族は既に出ているのでそのままgozokuとしました。

sen.j: 本条は、このような土地・人民に対する私的な所有・支配を排除し、天皇による統一的な支配体制への転換、すなわち私地私民制から公地公民制への転換を示すものと解釈されてきた。
sen.e: This Section has been considered to have eliminated such private ownership and ruling of lands and citizens and have converted the old system into a system in which the emperor comprehensively ruled the nation, in other words, conversion of private ownership of lands and citizens into a Kochi Komin system of state ownership of lands and citizens.

sen.j: しかし、実際にはかなり後世まで豪族による田荘・部曲の所有が認められていることから、必ずしも私的所有が全廃された訳ではないことが判る。
sen.e: In fact, however, judging from the fact that ownership of Tadokoro and Kakibe was still tolerated for a considerably long time after then, such private ownership had not been completely abolished by the edict.
